ref: 5708 tarás2 ʻ quick, energetic ʼ SV. &rcirclemacr Kho. (Lor.) təro ʻ fast (of horse) ʼ; -- N. tarkhar, tarbar ʻ activity, hastiness ʼ; B. tartar ʻ impatience ʼ; Or. taratara ʻ speedy ʼ; H. tarār ʻ quick ʼ, M. tartar: very doubtful. Or are they connected with tvarā f. ʻ speed ʼ MBh., tvarēṇa ʻ hastily ʼ BhP.?
